classes.confirmprompt: Would you like help with Bluemix container management (yes or no)?
texts: Can you help me with containers?

classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to list the Bluemix containers (yes or no)?
texts: Get a list of my containers
how many containers do I have?

classes.description: Show logs for a Bluemix container
classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to see the logs for the ${containername} Bluemix container (yes or no)?
texts: Show me the logs for container

parameters.name: containername
parameters.title: container name
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the container for which you want the logs?

classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to remove the ${containername} Bluemix container (yes or no)?

parameters.name: containername
parameters.title: container name
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the container you want to remove?

classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to start the ${containername} Bluemix container (yes or no)?

parameters.name: containername
parameters.title: container name
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the container you want to start?

classes.description: Show the status of a Bluemix container
classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to know the status of the ${containername} Bluemix container (yes or no)?

parameters.name: containername
parameters.title: container name
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the container for which you want the status?

classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to stop the ${containername} Bluemix container (yes or no)?

parameters.name: containername
parameters.title: container name
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the container you want to stop?

classes.confirmprompt: Would you like help with Bluemix container group management (yes or no)?
texts: Can you help me with containergroups?

classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to list the Bluemix container groups (yes or no)?
texts: Get a list of my containergroups
how many containergroups do I have?

classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to remove the ${containergroupname} Bluemix container group (yes or no)?

parameters.name: containergroupname
parameters.title: container group name
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the containergroup you want to remove?

classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to scale the ${containergroupname} Bluemix container group to ${instances} instances (yes or no)?
texts: Add another instance to my containergroup.
Add a new instance to my containergroup

parameters.name: containergroupname
parameters.title: container group name
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the containergroup you want to scale?

parameters.name: instances
parameters.prompt: OK. How many instances do you want to scale to?
